AUTH.LOGIN.TITLE: Login Account
AUTH.FORGOT.TITLE: Forgotten Password?
AUTH.FORGOT.DESC: Enter your email to reset your password
AUTH.FORGOT.SUCCESS: Your account has been successfully reset.
AUTH.FORGOT.REQUEST_SUCCESS: An email has been sent to help you recover your account, please check your inbox.
AUTH.RESET.TITLE: Reset Password
AUTH.RESET.DESC: Enter your new password to reset your password
AUTH.RESET.SUCCESS: Your password has been reset.You can now login to your account with the new password.
AUTH.VERIFY_EMAIL.TITLE: Email verification
AUTH.VERIFY_EMAIL.SUCCESS: Your email has been verified, you will be redirected to login in 3 seconds.
AUTH.REGISTER.TITLE: Sign Up
AUTH.REGISTER.DESC: Enter your details to create your account
AUTH.REGISTER.SUCCESS: Your account has been successfuly registered.
AUTH.VALIDATION.NOT_ADMIN: Only admins can perform this action
AUTH.VALIDATION.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: You need to verify your email before you can login.
AUTH.VALIDATION.MISMATCH_PASSWORD: Password and confirm password does not match
AUTH.SESSION.EXPIRED: Your session has expired, please login again to proceed
AUTH.SESSION.FAILED: We cannot log you in due to some errors, please login again.
TRY_AGAIN_LATER: Something went wrong, please try again later
SERVER_INTERNAL_ERROR: Something's wrong with our service, please try again later or contact us for help
TOKEN_EXPIRED: Your link has expired, please request a new one to continue.
PLEASE_WAIT: Please wait while we perform your action.
